args:
The party drives off the imperials and manages
to pass the preliminary audition. Hoping to carry
on, they begin intensive training in the secret
techniques of servants. After clearing the final
round, they are assigned to clean Emile's
quarters, putting the investigation in high gear.
WAUGH! I'm sorry, Emperor Emile!\nRetreat, everyone! Retreeeeat!
Oh, I'm SO sorry we had to do that,\nimperial folks! I hope you know we're\njust trying to help Emile too!
In any event, our mission is fulfilled.\nAll that remains is to see what the\nhead butler will say.

I bore witness to your actions just now.
With thoughts of Emperor Emile in your
hearts, you took on the imperial soldiers
without regard for your own safety.
Each of you is the very model of a servant,\nand I am utterly convinced that your\nmotives are pure as the driven snow.
In view of the two points above, I shall\nmake a special exception and declare\nthe three of you the final qualifiers.
We did, though it was a close thing.
All qualifiers will now move to the annex\nand await explanation of the next audition.\nGood luck to you all!
Right then. Off to the annex!

Congratulations to each of you on
successfully passing the qualifying round.
I shall now explain the final audition,
which is to be held tomorrow.

Emperor Emile spends much time in this
annex, you see, so the trial will see each
participant pitting their skills against one
another in a test of cleaning competency.
More advanced and delicate skills will be\nrequired than in the qualifying round—\nso let it be done, and done carefully!
Until then, get your rest. You will need it.
I heard quite the racket outside earlier,\nHiggins. What was it?
Why, if it isn't Emperor Emile himself!\nPray do forgive the racket, milord;\nsoldiers attacked some time ago.
But you may rest easy, for these brave\nsouls here put the devils to rout.
You there! You have done well.
I'm proud to have servants of such caliber.\nTruly I'm blessed to be surrounded by\nsuch impressive people.
'Tis the light of a wise ruler,\nmuchlike Aurelius.
Impossible! A brash and arrogant young\nman like Emperor Emile could never\nbecome so!

I know not of which you speak, but it is the
duty of a ruler to acknowledge and reward
good work when it is done. I expect great
things from you all in the future!
His words are pearls that permeate the\nvery soul. Indeed, Emperor Emile is on the\nvery precipice of a complete rebirth!
He is experiencing a metamorphosis into\na wise and good ruler, and thus must we\nexhaust ourselves in supporting him.
Having an excellent staff will be even\nmore critical at this time. And with that,\nI wish you all speed in tomorrow's trial.
＂Metamorphosis＂? ＂Rebirth＂? These are\naltogether unsettling words to hear.
Something is clearly amiss with Emile,\nyet I cannot dislodge the feeling that\nthe head butler is also hiding something.
Perhaps he knows that Emperor Emile has\nbeen possessed by a force that is on the\nverge of seizing all control.

Mere speculation at this stage. But if we're
to uncover the truth, we'll need to pass our
audition tomorrow—so let us ready
ourselves as best we can.
Right! Let's get lots of sleep tonight and\ncome at it bright-eyed and bushy—
And on that note, I have prepared a\nspecial course of training for you.
A true servant is normally not built in a\nday, but given the situation, we've not the\nleisure of adhering to such platitudes.
Thus, I shall now instruct you in the ways\nof the secret servants' techniques.
These techniques are a servant's ultimate\nweapons: skills devised to protect one's\nmaster in any and all manner of situations.
We've much ground to cover here, but let\nthis be the first lesson I teach you...

The name of this technique is, and I quote,
＂Clean a Disastrously Filthy Room
ASAP in Order to Protect Your Master
from Dust Allergies.＂
It's so clean as to be unrecognizable!\nThese servant techniques are a powerful\nthing indeed...
This is but an elementary-level skill,\nand can be learned by anyone with\nthe proper application of effort.
But of course. Among the intermediate\nskills, there is a famous one called...
As I said, it is the Adorbs Devotion Beam.
And what is the purpose of said\ntechnique, exactly?
You can't tell? It disperses evil spirits\nthrough means of a shout filled with\none's utter devotion.
I don't see how anyone could tell from a\nname like that.
I can teach it to you, if you like.
Yeah, um, maybe we should stick with the\nmore basic-level stuff like the dusty cleany\none for today?
Yes, well, perhaps that is best.
Now prepare yourselves, both of you,\nfor this training will be harder than any\nyou've yet faced.
You look sleepy, Zodiark. Guess you were\nup training even later than me, huh?
It took time for me to fully comprehend the\nintricacies of proper human etiquette.\nYou, however, picked it up immediately.
Hee hee! Yeah, I always helped out around\nthe house, so I'm pretty good at cleaning.
Are you sure you'll be okay though?\nIt's gonna be hard to do the trial if you\nhaven't had enough sleep.
I will be fine. Curiously, this annex is\nreplete with dark mana, which supplies\nall of the sustenance I need.
Boy, you dragons sure are something!\nI wonder if—Oh!
Good morning to you all. Henceforth,\nwe shall be conducting the final audition.

The rules are simple: excluding Emperor
Emile's chambers, you are to clean every
room in the annex to a mirror shine.
And with that...BEGIN!

And the substance of the trial is simpler
than I imagined. This should work out fine
so long as you make use of last evening's
training session.
Um, which room are you going to clean,\nZodiark? I can help and...
Huh? Where's Zodiark?! I could have sworn\nhe was right here with us and... Oh!
Go, all of you, so we might carry out\nthe sanitation of the main hall.

You! Clean windows. You! Scrub floors.
And you! Polish and dust all furniture.
I will supervise and provide final aid
as needed.
Right away, Mr. Zodiark! We'll show you\nwhat a little of our hard work can do!
Leave it to us, Your Excellency! We'll\nfollow you to the ends of the world!
I am in good form thanks to the dark mana;\nthe secret servant techniques should be\na simple matter for me right now.

My word, what leadership! And his own
skill is impressive as well, so much so that
I would entertain making him my right
hand! YOU PASS!
We'll support you forever, Your Excellency!
He brought them together so fast, the trial\nwas over before I even knew it started!
The dragon does impress. He gained\nstrength from the dark mana and\nshowcased his abilities as a leader.
Well then! As a butler true, I cannot be\noutshone in such a manner. Time to\ndemonstrate the advanced-level technique!
Spic and span the hall is cleaned!\nSee it shine and watch it gleam!

I suspected as much yesterday, but you are
clearly no ordinary man! Might you in fact
be a high-ranking butler, master of all the
noble arts of servitude?
Indeed I am—and that you should be able\nto perceive as much impresses.
I would be delighted for one of your poise\nand bearing to come into my employ.\nThis applicant is now an appliCAN! PASS!
So what am I gonna do? I don't have any\nconfidence in my ability to pass this test\non my own, but...
Damn it all, that's two more passed!\nTime to put myself ahead of the pack.
I can't worry about honor or the way things\nought to be done—I'm going to beat\neveryone else here no matter what!
Oh gee, and now it's every man and\nwoman for themselves. There's no way\nI'll convince anyone to pitch in now!
Huh? What is it, Mr. Mouse?\nDid you run off to the other room?

You were looking for a good place to do
my test...and you have something you
want me to come look at right now...?
Got it. Show me what you found!
Um, is it here, Mr. Mouse? 'Cause I\ndon't really see anyth—OH!
Oh, this is terrible! Your poor foot!\nWhat happened here, Mr. Mouse?
Oh no you don't, sister! I found this room,\nwhich makes it mine!
It's super dusty, and that means I'll get\ntons of points when I finish cleaning it.\nNow make like a carpet and beat it!
And how are you supposed to clean a room\nwhen you can't even walk on that foot?
I'm going to talk to the head butler\nand get you a doctor.
No! They'll drop me if I need a doctor!\nI won't let a stupid thing like a terribly\ninjured foot stop me from cleaning!
Even in this state, I'm going to tidy up this\nroom and win my spot! I'm not giving up!
Um, at the very least then, please let me\nhelp you.
What? Why? I'm not going to give you\ncredit for it.
I know. That's fine. I'll tell the head butler\nthat you did it all.
That makes as much sense as a three-\nrupie note. What's your game here, kid?
Well, this way the cleaning is done faster\nAND it'll be fun.
And once we're done, we can make sure\nyour foot doesn't fall off!
You're a weird one, kid... But fine.\nHelp if you want—just make sure you\nstay outta my way at the end!
*yawn* That was a lot of work, but it looks\nlike we managed to finish.
You're better at cleaning than I thought\nyou'd be, kid. Appreciate it.
It's 'cause I always help with cleaning!\nOh, and all the training I got lately.
If you say so. Just remember that you\npromised to let me take all the credit.
And YOU promised to get your foot treated\nonce we're done!
You and this foot—you'd think it belonged\nto you. Anyway, let's hurry up and get the\nthe head butler in here so...
Eeeeek! You snuck up on us!
But of course, for I am the head butler!\nNow as for the examination of this room...
Every nook and cranny of the room has\nbeen carefully cleaned and polished.\nThis is excellent work.
Yeah, she worked really hard on it!

It takes no small amount of determination
to toil so diligently while one's foot is
injured. This has been well and truly
noted on my part.
However! A truly excellent member of the\nstaff would not have hidden such an injury.

If you lie about your physical condition,
you will be unable to perform your work,
which could well end up a source of
unnecessary worry for your employer.
So while it pains me to say it...YOU FAIL!\nI hope you will make another attempt\nonce you are restored to full health.
Okay, I'll try harder next... Wait, I pass?\nBut...but why? How?
Because I witnessed your concern for that\nwoman's injury, and saw you offer to help\neven at the expense of your own future.

Skill and charisma alone are not all that is
required of an exceptional servant. Warm
and attentive care for others is also vital,
and you clearly have this in great quantity.
So as I said more quietly before...PASS!\nNow then, all passing applicants are to\nreport to the waiting room at once.
As you can see, the winners of the\naudition are you three individuals.

With that, I would have you get right to
taking care of Emperor Emile's personal
spaces. You can start by cleaning his
sleeping quarters.
You will begin after waking the emperor\ntomorrow morning. Understood?
Though it required much effort, we have\ncome a step closer to our objective.
Indeed. Now we can communicate with\nEmperor Emile directly, as well as\ninvestigate his private quarters.
We shall assess the true nature of\nwhatever devilry has befallen him.
Just hang on a little longer, Emile!
See how they overflow with enthusiasm!\nTruly my judgment was not lacking.
Ah, my excellent new servants. Now there\nwill be more friends at last—and the party\ncan truly booooo-gin! Aaah ha ha ha!
